contentrichtext.text: '''Zappa''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==People== *[[Frank Zappa]], American composer and musician **[[Moon Unit Zappa]], Frank's daughter **[[Dweezil Zappa]], Frank's son **[[Ahmet Zappa]], Frank's son **[[Diva Zappa]], Frank's daughter **[[Gail Zappa]], Frank's wife *[[Francesco Zappa]], Italian composer and cellist of the 18th century *[[GÅ Zappa]], Japanese novelist *[[Guido Zappa]], Italian mathematician ==Fiction== *Zappa, a [[List of Chrono Cross characters#Red innate characters|character from the ''Chrono Cross'']] RPG *[[Zappa (Guilty Gear)]], a character from the 2-D fighting game series ''Guilty Gear'' *[[Zappa (film)|''Zappa'' (film)]], a Danish coming-of-age film directed by Bille August *Zappa, a group of meerkats featured in ''[[Meerkat Manor]]'' ==Science and technology== *''[[Zappa confluentus]]'', a goby from Papua New Guinea *''[[Pachygnatha zappa]]'', a spider *[[Zappa (chess)]], the computer chess program that won the 13th World Computer Chess Championship ==Other== *Zappa, demo by Italian artist [[Caparezza]] {{disambiguation}}
